duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ الْهُدَى وَالتُّقَى وَالْعَفَافَ وَالْغِنَى
duas.translation: O Allah, I ask You for guidance, piety, chastity, and self-sufficiency.
My Lord, increase me in knowledge.
I seek refuge with Allah from the accursed Satan.
Glory be to Allah and praise be to Him.

duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِي وَارْحَمْنِي وَاهْدِنِي وَعَافِنِي
duas.translation: O Allah, forgive me, have mercy on me, guide me, and grant me well-being.

duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْهَمِّ وَالْحَزَنِ
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge with You from worry and sorrow.

duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ اجْعَلْنِي مِنَ التَّوَّابِينَ وَاجْعَلْنِي مِنَ الْمُتَطَهِّرِينَ
duas.translation: O Allah, make me among those who turn to You in repentance and those who purify themselves.

duas.arabic: رَبَّنَا آتِنَا فِي الدُّنْيَا حَسَنَةً وَفِي الْآخِرَةِ حَسَنَةً وَقِنَا عَذَابَ النَّارِ
duas.translation: Our Lord, give us good in this world and good in the Hereafter, and save us from the punishment of the Fire.

duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ أَنْتَ رَبِّي لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ خَلَقْتَنِي وَأَنَا عَبْدُكَ
duas.translation: O Allah, You are my Lord, there is no deity except You. You created me and I am Your servant.

duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ اجعل القرآن ربيع قلبي ونور صدري وجلاء حزني وذهاب همي
duas.translation: O Allah, make the Qur'an the spring of my heart, the light of my chest, the remover of my sadness, and the dispeller of my worry.
